title: Why do I need to learn so many languages​​, I only need to master a language is enough
body:
by **ktztysj@sina.com**: 
I hope Google can create a language: the same as the C language uses very little memory,
this language is a dynamic language with static language, avoid them to learn
languages​​, I would prefer that this language is slightly more complicated, but I
do not want to learn a variety oflanguage, I hope to go language so
